description:
No matter how fancy your suspension is, if you don’t have your pressures dialed, you’re going to have a bad ride. This compact pump will keep your shocks topped up and feeling plush. Capable of outputting up to 300PSI, you have more than enough pressure to set your suspension up right.

  • Large easy to read dial
  • Bleed button to fine tune your pressure
  • Durable aluminum barrel, steel shaft and composite accents
  • Ergonomic handle
  • Rotating hose for a comfortable pumping angle
  • Compact design fits in your car
name: RockShox HP Shock/Fork Pump
